subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals travel to Yankee Stadium on Friday, a complicated proposition for the Yankees’ first-base coach, Tony Peña. His son, Tony Peña Jr., is the Royals’ shortstop.
snippet: The Kansas City Royals travel to Yankee Stadium on Friday, a complicated proposition for the Yankees’ first-base coach, Tony Peña. His son, Tony Peña Jr., is the Royals’ shortstop.
